Banner.Description: With 6+ years of frontend development experience,I architect scalable and modular frontend systems, develop reusable and performance-optimized UI components, and implement accessibility-focused solutions aligned with web standards. I emphasize clean, maintainable, and testable code, primarily working with Angular and modern JavaScript.
